text.section:
A person may not:
directly or indirectly publish a false, deceptive, or misleading advertisement about home improvement; or
advertise or offer, by any means, to perform a home improvement if the person does not intend to accept a home improvement contract:
to do the particular home improvement; or
at the price advertised or offered.
An advertisement that is subject to and complies with regulations adopted by the Federal Trade Commission is not false, deceptive, or misleading.
